name: Sylvieâ€™s Steamer Berry Cheesecake
preparation: Prepare filling by blending the first four ingredients in a mixing bowl.
Prepare crust by combining graham cracker crumbs with butter. Press into a lightly oiled Rectangular Steamer.
Spoon filling over crust. Cover and microwave on high for 5-6 min.
Remove lid and let cheesecake cool completely before removing from pan and cutting into squares or slices.
tips: Top with fresh berries or your favourite berry jam.

products.name: Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix
summary: A tangy, fruity blend of raspberries, strawberries, hibiscus & a touch of rooibos. Sweet dip & a seasoning!

products.name: Rectangular Steamer
summary: Easy to clean. Easy to serve. Rectangular, silicone steamer is perfect for side dishes & desserts.
